i-am: I am a frontend developer in the road to fullstack.
about-text: My name is Daniel Fernando Estrada Escaray, im a Computer Technician and self-taught Frontend developer, actually i live in Buenos Aires Argentina. Even though i already knew some things about programming since highschool, i started to gain interst in web development this year, frontend development to be precise. I am constantly learning trying to make personal projects and searching a way to make them. As a hobby i like to learn new languages and discover new music, right now im learning japanese and english.
